statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT id, product_name, supplier FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity >= 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, location, last_updated FROM inventory_management WHERE supplier = 'Supplier A';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity <= 50
SELECT product_name, location, supplier FROM inventory_management ORDER BY location ASC, supplier DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE location='Warehouse A' AND quantity < 50
SELECT id, product_name, supplier FROM inventory_management WHERE last_updated >= '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price FROM inventory_data WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT id, location, in_transit FROM logistics_data WHERE in_transit = TRUE ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price, location FROM inventory_data JOIN logistics_data ON inventory_data.id = logistics_data.product_id WHERE in_transit = true ORDER BY quantity DESC

SELECT product_name, location, estimated_delivery_date FROM inventory_data JOIN logistics_data ON inventory_data.id = logistics_data.product_id WHERE estimated_delivery_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory_data WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT location FROM inventory WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A' AND quantity <= 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity AS order_quantity, shipments.quantity AS shipment_quantity FROM orders INNER JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id AND orders.quantity > shipments.quantity
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_id = 101;
SELECT supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 201;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity_ordered >= 10;
SELECT order_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Logistics WHERE route_id = 501 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sum(quantity) as total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, i.product_name, i.price FROM Orders o JOIN Inventory i ON o.product_id = i.id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Inventory i JOIN Orders o ON i.id = o.product_id JOIN Logistics l ON l.order_id = o.order_id WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT item_name, quantity, cost FROM inventory_items ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, category, cost FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, cost FROM inventory_items WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY category;
SELECT i.item_name, t.transaction_type, t.quantity FROM inventory_items i INNER JOIN transactions t ON i.item_id = t.item_id WHERE t.transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN shipments sh ON s.supplier_id = sh.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name ORDER BY total_shipments DESC;

SELECT w.location, SUM(sh.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses w INNER JOIN shipments sh ON w.warehouse_id = sh.item_id GROUP BY w.location HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
